title: Yoda Translate Application
content: This unique application utilizes two API's that when combined, produce an inspirational quote from the widely known character, Yoda!

title: Glazed & Confused
content: An application that is designed for a flavorful and new Donut Shop that takes the user through a fantastic donut shopping experience!

title: Meet-IO Workplace Application
content: An application that is designed for any team/family/or simply someone with a busy schedule to track what they need to get done and with whom via a live chat function utilzing websockets!
